physical_description.build: Wiry, practical strength from work; graceful without deliberate display; compact frame suited to movement through crowds

primary_traits.description: Masterfully uses overlooked status as strength; operationally brilliant through being underestimated
Notices details others miss; understands human motivation and structural vulnerabilities
Direct encounter with divine makes her certain and unafraid; faith not dependent on doctrine
Deeply loyal; willing to sacrifice; guardian instinct toward those she commits to
Intellectually capable but chooses to appear simple; strategic self-effacement

strengths.shows_in: Moving through restricted spaces unnoticed; gathering intelligence freely; protecting spear by being last person anyone would suspect
Knowing guard routines before others see them; reading people's intentions; identifying safe routes and danger points
Unshakeable certainty; refusal to be frightened by authorities; ability to inspire faith in others
Risk-taking for community protection; refusal to betray anyone; caring for people beyond practical necessity
Coordinating women followers; managing safe houses; distributing intelligence; building trust across communities

Carries weight of secrets; loyalty to people who cannot acknowledge her publicly; rare moments of surfacing loneliness

core_motivations: Protect divine truth and those who carry resurrection testimony
Build community among overlooked women; show them their power
Honor the divine encounter she witnessed; commit absolutely to preserving testimony
Protect vulnerable people (women, refugees, followers); offer safety to those persecuted

relationships.dynamic: Deep friendship based on mutual spiritual understanding; partnership in protecting spear; unacknowledged romantic potential; met during refugee crisis; immediately recognized spiritual kinship

Leader and guide; organized network; spiritual mother figure; they trust her completely; recognize her spiritual authority; follow her leadership

story_arc.opening_state: Recently committed to follower community; newly befriended Malchus; beginning to organize women; understanding her role
story_arc.transformation: From curious skeptic evaluating claims, through witnessing evidence of divine power and Longinus's healing, to committed follower and network builder
story_arc.closing_state: Established strategist and network leader; spear keeper; either martyr preserving testimony through sacrifice or survivor leader of women's community

thematic_significance: Invisible strength and power through service
Women's essential role in preservation of testimony
Faith that doesn't require institutional approval
character.why_readers_care: Salome represents the power of those society overlooks. Her character demonstrates how strategic invisibility becomes operational strength, how women's overlooked status enables them to protect what visible leaders cannot. Readers watch her build networks, protect the spear, and teach other women to claim their power. Her faith comes from direct encounter rather than doctrine, making her certain and unafraid. Through Salome, readers see how the most essential work often happens in shadows, how those without formal authority can accomplish the impossible, and how grace works through the overlooked to preserve testimony.
character_questions_for_readers: Can those without formal authority lead effectively?
What is the cost of being the one who protects but cannot be acknowledged?
How does direct encounter with divine differ from doctrinal faith?
What happens when those society overlooks hold the greatest strategic power?
